TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ObjectDataSourceDesigner extends System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceDesigner

summary.span: 在視覺化設計工具中，為 Web 伺服器控制項提供設計階段支援。

span.span: Provides design-time support in a visual designer for the Web server control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控制項所代表的資料來源，才能執行 Delete、 Insert、 Select 和 Update 資料庫作業會呼叫商務物件方法。The control represents a data source that calls methods of a business object in order to perform the Delete, Insert, Select, and Update database operations. 在視覺化設計工具中，當您從來源切換至 [設計] 檢視中，標記來源的程式碼，描述控制會經過剖析，而在設計介面上建立控制項的設計階段版本。In a visual designer, when you switch from Source to Design view, the markup source code that describes the control is parsed and a design-time version of the control is created on the design surface. 當您切換回原始碼檢視時，以設計階段控制項保存到標記來源的程式碼並編輯網頁的標記。When you switch back to Source view, the design-time control is persisted to the markup source code and edited into the markup for the Web page. 類別提供設計階段支援視覺化設計工具中的控制項。The class provides design-time support for the control in a visual designer. 類別成員提供下列功能：The class members provide the following functionality: - 屬性會指出是否可以顯示 [設定資料來源精靈]。The property indicates whether the Configure Data Source wizard can be displayed. 屬性會指出是否相關聯的結構描述控制項可以在設計階段重新整理。The property indicates whether the schema of the associated control can be refreshed at design time. - 屬性會指定執行選取的函式的方法。The property specifies the method that performs the Select function. 屬性會指定關聯的控制項提供資料的商務物件的類型。The property specifies the type of the business object that provides the data for the associated control. - 方法會傳回具有指定名稱的資料來源檢視。The method returns a data source view with the specified name. 方法會傳回一份相關聯的資料來源檢視名稱控制項。The method returns a list of data source view names for the associated control. 方法會從相關聯的商務物件中擷取 Select 方法的中繼資料。The method extracts the metadata for the Select method from the associated business object. - 方法會導致要顯示在視覺化設計工具介面上設定資料來源精靈。The method causes the Configure Data Source wizard to be displayed on the visual designer surface. 方法會移除從屬性、 加入其他屬性，或是遮蔽關聯控制項的屬性。The method removes properties from, adds additional properties to, or shadows properties of the associated control. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何擴充若要變更的外觀和行為的控制項衍生自類別控制項在設計階段。The following code example shows how to extend the class to change the appearance and behavior of controls that are derived from the control at design time. 範例衍生`MyObjectDataSource`控制項從。The example derives the `MyObjectDataSource` control from the . `MyObjectDataSource`是一份控制項。The `MyObjectDataSource` is a copy of the control. 此範例也是衍生`MyObjectDataSourceDesigner`類別從，並套用屬性`MyObjectDataSourceDesigner`上`MyObjectDataSource`控制項。The example also derives the `MyObjectDataSourceDesigner` class from the and applies a attribute for the `MyObjectDataSourceDesigner` on the `MyObjectDataSource` control. `MyObjectDataSourceDesigner`會覆寫方法，讓屬性顯示在**屬性**在設計階段的方格。The `MyObjectDataSourceDesigner` overrides the method to make the property visible in the **Properties** grid at design time. `MyObjectDataSourceDesigner`會覆寫方法，以顯示和屬性中的預留位置，除了的控制項型別和 id。The `MyObjectDataSourceDesigner` overrides the method to display the and properties in a placeholder, in addition to the control type and ID. [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDesigner#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDesigner/CS/ObjectDataSourceDesigner.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDesigner#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDesigner/VB/ObjectDataSourceDesigner.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks .NET Framework 在內部建立的新執行個體類別時，它會建立相關聯控制項或在視覺化設計工具介面上的該控制項的複本。The .NET Framework internally constructs a new instance of the class when it creates the associated control or a copy of that control on the visual designer surface.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Overrides ReadOnly Property CanConfigure As Boolean
public: virtual property bool CanConfigure { bool get(); };

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 取得值，指出是否可以呼叫 方法。

span.span: Gets a value that indicates whether the method can be called.

value.span: 如果可以呼叫 方法則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if the method can be called; otherwise.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以呼叫方法，而屬性是`true`的話相關聯的屬性控制項實作或介面。The method can be called, and the property is `true`, if the property of the associated control implements either the or the interface. 如果已`true`，則**設定資料來源**功能表項目會顯示在**ObjectDataSource 的一般工作**關聯控制項的視覺化設計工具上的操作功能表介面。If the is `true`, the **Configure Data Source** menu item is displayed in the **Common ObjectDataSource Tasks** context menu of the associated control on the visual designer surface. 選取此功能表項目時，會叫用 「 設定資料來源精靈 」。The Configure Data Source wizard is invoked when this menu item is selected.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Overrides ReadOnly Property CanRefreshSchema As Boolean
public: virtual property bool CanRefreshSchema { bool get(); };

summary.span: 取得值，指出是否可以呼叫 方法。

span.span: Gets a value that indicates whether the method can be called.

value.span: 如果可以呼叫 則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if the can be called; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以呼叫方法，而屬性是`true`的話相關聯的屬性控制項實作或介面，而和屬性都包含值。The method can be called, and the property is `true`, if the property of the associated control implements either the or interface, and the and properties both contain a value. 如果已`true`，則**重新整理結構描述**功能表項目會顯示在**ObjectDataSource 的一般工作**關聯控制項的視覺化設計工具介面上的操作功能表。If the is `true`, the **Refresh Schema** menu item is displayed in the **Common ObjectDataSource Tasks** context menu of the associated control on the visual designer surface.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance void Configure() cil managed

summary.span: 在視覺化設計工具介面上顯示設定資料來源精靈。

span.span: Displays the Configure Data Source wizard on the visual designer surface.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會起始交易，導致設定資料來源精靈才會出現在視覺化設計工具介面上。The method initiates a transaction that causes the Configure Data Source wizard to appear on the visual designer surface. 當您選取時，會呼叫方法**設定資料來源**功能表項目**ObjectDataSource 的一般工作**相關聯的操作功能表控制項。The method is called when you select the **Configure Data Source** menu item on the **Common ObjectDataSource Tasks** context menu of the associated control. **設定資料來源**操作功能表上出現的功能表項目時屬性是`true`。The **Configure Data Source** menu item appears on the context menu when the property is `true`.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance class System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerDataSourceView GetView(string viewName) cil managed
Public Overrides Function GetView (viewName As String) As DesignerDataSourceView

span.span: A string containing the name of the .

summary.span: 傳回具有指定名稱的資料來源檢視。

span.span: Returns a data source view with the specified name.

returns.span: 具有 所指定名稱的 。

span.span: An with the name specified by .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會傳回具有指定名稱的物件。The method returns an object with the specified name. 如果`viewName`已`null`或空字串 ("")，所傳回的名稱陣列中的第一個檢視名稱做為指定的名稱。If `viewName` is `null` or an empty string (""), the first view name in the array of names that is returned by is used as the specified name. 如果檢視沒有傳回任何名稱所，會產生未命名。If no view names are returned by the , generates an unnamed .

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance string[] GetViewNames() cil managed
Public Overrides Function GetViewNames () As String()

summary.span: 傳回關聯的控制項之資料來源檢視名稱清單。

span.span: Returns a list of data source view names for the associated control.

returns.span: 字串陣列，包含關聯的 之 物件的名稱。

span.span: A string array containing the names of the objects of the associated .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法取得檢視名稱的結構描述的名稱相關聯控制項的資料表。The method gets the view names from the names of the schema data tables of the associated control.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance void PreFilterProperties(class System.Collections.IDictionary properties) cil managed
Protected Overrides Sub PreFilterProperties (properties As IDictionary)

param.name: properties
param.span: 集合，實作已加入和已遮蔽屬性的 。

span.span: A collection implementing the of the added and shadowed properties.

summary.span: 供設計工具使用，以便在 [屬性] 方格的顯示中移除屬性或新增屬性，或是遮蔽關聯控制項的屬性。

span.span: Used by the designer to remove properties from or add additional properties to the display in the **Properties** grid or to shadow properties of the associated control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控制項設計工具使用的方法，衍生自陰影對應的設計階段屬性設計工具實作，使用的各種控制項屬性，以將屬性新增至或從其中移除屬性的方法**屬性**方格。Control designers use methods that are derived from the method to shadow various control properties with corresponding design-time properties that the designer implements, and to add properties to or remove properties from the **Properties** grid. 方法會建立設計階段屬性，以陰影並關聯的屬性控制項，使其出現在**屬性**的視覺化設計工具的格線。The method creates design-time properties to shadow the and properties of the associated control so that they appear in the **Properties** grid of the visual designer. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何覆寫方法中的類別，繼承自類別，以變更**屬性**方格控制項衍生自類別在設計時間。The following code example shows how to override the method in a class that is inherited from the class to change the **Properties** grid of a control that is derived from the class at design time. 範例會使屬性顯示在**屬性**方格。The example makes the property visible in the **Properties** grid. [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDesigner#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDesigner/CS/ObjectDataSourceDesigner.cs#4)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDesigner#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDesigner/VB/ObjectDataSourceDesigner.vb#4)]

span.para: 覆寫方法，以將屬性新增至或變更設計階段屬性集合中屬性的屬性。請務必呼叫基底方法，然後再執行其他處理程序。
Override the method to add properties to or change attributes of properties in the design-time property collection. Be sure to call the base method before performing other processing.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance void RefreshSchema(bool preferSilent) cil managed
Public Overrides Sub RefreshSchema (preferSilent As Boolean)

param.name: preferSilent
param.span: 如果為 ，則在處理期間發生例外狀況 (Exception) 時不會顯示錯誤訊息，否則會顯示例外狀況訊息。

span.span: If , does not display error messages when exceptions occur during processing; otherwise, exception messages are displayed.

summary.span: 從關聯控制項所指定的商務物件中，擷取 Select 方法的中繼資料。

span.span: Extracts the metadata for the Select method from the business object that is specified by the associated control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會擷取藉由名為方法的中繼資料屬性從命名的物件屬性，這是提供資料的商務物件的類型相關聯控制項。The method extracts the metadata for the method that is named by the property from the object that is named by the property, which is the type of the business object that provides the data for the associated control. 中繼資料會儲存在陣列和設計工具 的陣列。The metadata is saved in a array and in the array of the designer.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ SelectMethod { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.SelectMethod : string with get, set

summary.span: 呼叫關聯的控制項之 方法時，取得或設定要執行的方法名稱。

span.span: Gets or sets the name of the method to execute when the method of the associated control is called.

value.span: 字串 (String)，包含呼叫 時要執行方法的名稱。

span.span: A string containing the name of the method to execute when the is called.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性 shadows關聯控制項的屬性。The property shadows the property of the associated control. 當 windows 7屬性變更時，相關聯的設計階段標記控制項的更新。When the value of the property is changed, the design-time markup for the associated control is updated. 呼叫方法時，如果屬性是 true，否則就會引發事件。The method is called, if the property is true; otherwise, the event is raised.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ TypeName { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.TypeName : string with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定包含方法 (關聯的控制項中指定的方法) 的型別名稱。

span.span: Gets or sets the name of the type that contains the methods that are specified in the associated control.

value.span: 包含型別名稱的字串，而型別包含關聯的 中指定的方法 (會執行 Delete、Insert、Select 和 Update 資料庫作業)。

span.span: A string containing the name of the type that contains the methods that perform the Delete, Insert, Select, and Update database operations specified in the associated .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性 shadows關聯控制項的屬性。The property shadows the property of the associated control. 當 windows 7屬性變更時，相關聯的設計階段標記控制項的更新。When the value of the property is changed, the design-time markup for the associated control is updated. 呼叫方法時，如果屬性是 true，否則就會引發事件。The method is called, if the property is true; otherwise, the event is raised.
